product_name: Mountain Hardwear Embolden Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The flexibile soft-shell fabric of the Mountain Hardwear Embolden jacket offers windproof protection, and is a great choice for active pursuits where freedom of movement is a must. AirShield(TM) soft-shell fabric is highly water resistant and completely blocks the wind, yet is breathable; soft backing helps wick away moisture and adds light warmth. Helmet-compatible hood with single-handed drawcords, hem drawcords and cuff tabs all let you adjust the fit quickly. Mountain Hardwear Embolden jacket has zippered hand pockets, a zippered chest pocket and internal stash pocket. Internal draft flap; Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined chin guard. Semifitted to enhance performance and layering. Closeout.
